 Talom/Nightlight: Nighlight looked at Talon and Straightshot and Talon s=
aid "That's true... We belive that is that or something is controlling him.=
.. " Nightlight said almost in low voice "If something happens me, will you=
 and Tucson care Elita?" Talon looked surpriced at Nightlight and said "Wha=
t are you saying?"To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Da=
te: Tue, 30 Aug 2011 22:53:48 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.



=







        












Straight Shot enters the room with Talon and is=
 careful not to wake Elita.  She smiles while looking to Nightlight and the=
 cub.
" I can just see it now, all of us together, watching the young bots =
develop Their skills together..  Elita would really love ta have someone ta=
 pal around with.  I bet in the near future that will happen.  And Nightlig=
ht, don't worry, Ticson is out there looking for Wheelie and I bet he'll fi=
nd Rodimus too.  I got ta thinking about things and I realized that the she=
ll program was long since gone a while ago.   I bet that Dark Rodimus is a =
copy of the real Rodimus.  And if they're out there, Tucson will find them.=
  Isn't that right, Talon?"

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
=
On Aug 30, 2011, at 8:18 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wr=
ote:






 



    
      
      
      


Nightlight/Elita:
 
Talon smile=
d and glenty hit the door and feminine voice said "Come in"
 
Nightlight wa=
s sat down in one bed when Talon came in, and elita was deeply sleep. 
 
Ta=
lon came in and sat down close to Nighlight whose was looking at the floor.=

 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Tue, 30 Aug=
 2011 08:29:31 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        =













Straight Shot transforms into her robot mode and follows Talon=
 to Nightlight's quarters.  She was happy to know that her suggestion was a=
ctually considered by Leo Prime, about getting the femme bots together as a=
 team.
" I really didn't think Leo would go for my idea of letting the femm=
e bots work as a team.  He sure surprised me."

Perpetually on the move and=
 constantly busy. 
On Aug 30, 2011, at 12:46 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly=
2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      



Talon:
 
"=
Let's go then "saind the female while she walked towards Nighlgiht's quater=
s  
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Mon, 29 A=
ug 2011 23:53:26 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










      =
  












Straight Shot nods. 
" Sure.  Let's go.  She'll be happy ta =
know that Master Nightshift is accepting her and Elita as his students."

P=
erpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, at 11:38 PM, =
Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
 =
     
      



Talon:
 
Looking at straight shot "Do you want to come with=
 me and pay a visit at Nightlight?"
 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magi=
cquartz@...
Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2011 23:31:54 -0400
Subject: Re: Lesson=
s to be Learned.










        












Nightshift nods as he gets =
Talon's transmission.
" No problem, I'm flexible."
Perpetually on the move =
and constantly busy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, at 11:03 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <ai=
rly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      



Talon:
=
 
"I think that Elita is too young to train outside the ark"said Talon
 
To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2011=
 19:24:03 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        




=








Nightshift thinks for a moment. If anything, Tucson would rely on g=
round tracking to find Wheelie.  
" Most likely his field track'n tactics. =
 That means he's gonna land at the area and attempt ta follow Wheelie on fo=
ot.  He knows how ta identify a bot just by foot and tire tracks alone. One=
 more thing, he's got sharp senses and he was promised he'd be able ta go i=
t alone.  Get downwind of him and he won't be too happy.  Even I know bette=
r then ta mess with him."


Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
O=
n Aug 29, 2011, at 6:28 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:=







 



    
      
      
      > <OLD>

>

> Nightshift nods to Leo's=
 request.

>

> " School will have ta open a little later than expected.  O=
kay Leo, I'm on

> it."

>

> He transforms into SUV mode and rolls off tow=
ard Polar Claw.

>

> " Hey Leo, ya might wanna make sure Tucson doesn't se=
e ya!  He gets wind

> that you didn't let em do that mission on his own, h=
e's gonna see that as an

> act of distrust.  Then he's really gonna be in =
a bad mood.  Trust me, I

> know.  Ratchet was the same way.  Like dad like=
 son."



<NEW>



"I know." LEO PRIME said over the radio "But sometimes t=
hings are far

more important than his anger."



When NIGHTSHIFT arrived a=
t POLAR CLAW's location he was already

standing with RAMULUS and the group=
's tactical expert PROWL, they were

all in robot mode standing at the shut=
tle.



WOLFGANG was standing off to the side manipulating something. "Its
=

fueled up and ready to go." WLFGANG said as he stowed an energon

dispensi=
ng unit in its holster.



"Good!" POLAR CLAW said. he was easily the large=
st of the group. While

not as tall as RODIMUS or TUSCON were, he was still=
 broad and massive,

giving he appearance of great size and ferocity.



PO=
LAR CLAW turned to look at NIGHTSHIFT, "You're here because you know

Tusco=
n better than we." There was a dismissive grunt as he glanced at

a PADD he=
 had in his hand, it is ohviously the notes and mission

parameters he reci=
eved from LEO PRIME.



"He's gone out alone. Sensors showed that he was go=
ing off in the

direction of that jungle where Rodimus is suppose to be." T=
here was

another pause from POLAR CLAW, "The same direction Wheelie took a=
s

well."



POLAR CLAW lowered his padd as he looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every=
 scan we

have of that place shows it is a dense jungle, his inhanced sense=
s

will not help him much there. What tactic do you think he will use to

l=
ocate Wheelie?"



(TAG)



Preston
